scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:ethlint
scripts.export:artifacts: npm run clean && npm run compile && cp ./build/contracts/*.json ./artifacts
scripts.deploy:development: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='development' && truffle migrate && npm run export:artifacts
scripts.deploy:nile: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='nile' && truffle migrate --network nile && npm run export:artifacts
scripts.deploy:pacific: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='pacific' && truffle migrate --network pacific && npm run export:artifacts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='mainnet' && truffle migrate --network mainnet && npm run export:artifacts
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='rinkeby' && truffle migrate --network rinkeby && npm run export:artifacts
scripts.deploy:polygon: npm run clean && npm run compile && export NETWORK='polygon' && truffle migrate --network polygon && npm run export:artifacts
